archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.1.5d: d) tailoring the programme to address the risk profile of different groups (e.g. raising awareness of whaling campaigns with senior executives or 419 scams with financial assistants)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
